text: Bradford Swain Linaweaver (September 1, 1952 - August 29, 2019) was an American science fiction and fantasy writer. He was known for directing The Brain Leeches and Jack-O. He also wrote Libertarian-leaning novels such as The Boneyard Collection and Space Babes Meet the Monsters. Linaweaver was born in Washington, North Carolina. His best known novel was Moon of Ice.
